text:
So, what do we know
about Theodore Snickering?

He stole a page
from the Book Of Souls

and trapped us
in the Escape Room.

He has the power
to control minds

which the talisman
protects you from.

What? I'm just saying
not everybody can
pull off a bowtie.

He also has
a mystery board
like Remy's

with all of
our pictures
on it.
If only we had his board.

Exactly. Then I could
replace my picture
with a better one.

No. I meant because
I can't remember
everything on it.

Would you give
me a hand?

Let's just say
I had some help

from the newest member
of S.W.E.A.T.I.

Not a member,
but I did buy the hat.

I just took some pictures
and had them blown up

so I could
meticulously
recreate it.

And, uh, I carried it in here.
So we're both amazing.

Check it out.
Looks like Theodore's
been investigating us too.

I can't believe
Grim didn't tell me
anything about this.

She has got
some major
explaining to do.

So you and the
Grim Reaper talk.

I'm still trying
to wrap my head
around all this.

I spoke to her
once too.
No big deal.

So, uh, where's
your little buddy,
Carson?

Just when I need him the most,
he's at Piccolo Camp.

Which is why I'm deputizing
all of you into S.W.E.A.T.I.

I'll, uh, also need
an initiation fee of $50.

Come on, GR. Where are you?
We need to talk.

Well, someone's
in a bit of a snit fit.

Why didn't you tell me
about Theodore Snickering?

Why do you keep
leaving me in the dark?

You know I can snit
with the best of them.

Middle-naming me
is not gonna work
this time.

I keep you on a need-to-know
basis in order to protect you.

All you had to do
was be open
and honest with me.

I'm the Grim Reaper, sweetie,
not a greeting card.

So, what are we gonna do
about Theodore? He's onto us.

He's got a conspiracy board
with all of our faces on it.

But in the spirit of sharing,
you should know,

if we succeed, you will
no longer need your guardians.

Pretty and Scary will return
to the underworld.

See? Not always so great
to know everything.

(SIGHS)
Now, butter your toast,
I'll tell you more.

I just saw Frankie talking
to herself or the toaster.

Now that
you mention it,
I saw Frankie

talking to herself
in the mirror
the other day.

Though she did
seem really upset
at the toaster.

And all the tasks
we've been doing

are part of getting him
back to the underworld.

At times like these,
I'm reminded
of what's most important.

I knew old man
Snickering
reeked of evil.

should be run out
of this town.

I, I can't believe
my great-grandfather
caused all this.

Hey, no time
for googly eyes!
Now, what's the plan?

Grim told me
to sit tight.

But I say we go
to the mansion.

Then we're going
to the mansion.

She also told me that
Theodore's hiding a page

from the Book Of Souls
with his signature on it.

If we can find it
and return it to Grim--

She'll finally be able
to take him back
to the underworld?

Does that mean
what I think it means?

that means
you'll never
see him again.

After what he's done
to you all,
I can't defend him.

I don't know
what Theodore's
hiding up his sleeve,

but I do know
we all need
to be protected.

just need the talisman
so I can split it
between all of us.

No, knew that.
That's a good...
good idea.

The mirror you ordered
has arrived, sir.

Wonderful.
Set it by the fireplace.
Uh, a smidge to the left.

Does your team not know
what a smidge is?

It's slightly more
than a tad, sir.
How did you get in here?

While Grim was distracted,
I snuck a peek at the
Grim Reaper guidebook

and figured out how to
pop back and forth
from the underworld.

The student
has become the master.

And the student
is bringing the master down.

So you said you had something
from the underworld
that will help us?

Grim normally
keeps this orb
under lock and key.

I can see why.
It's so tacky.

It takes away her powers
and renders her helpless.

I picked
the right partner
in crime.

I have to go
before Grim notices
I'm gone.

Yeah, I need
my own catchphrase.

Whatever this underworld rock
is made out of,
we can't crack it.

We tried a hammer, melting it,
dropping a bowling ball on it.

Too bad we don't have
a bolt of lightning.

I think that can
be arranged.

Erlic, you might not wanna
stand so close to her.

I'm basically
a human tropical storm.

N-No, that's like
the coolest thing
I've ever seen.

You're the coolest thing
I've ever seen.

How'd you like
a personal rainstorm?

You made a very big mistake
bringing a mirror
into your mansion.
Oh. You mean, uh, this one?

(SIGHS) You tricked me once,
Theodore, but never again.

I am bringing you back
to the underworld right now.

That's strange.
My zap doesn't
seem to be working.

I can't reveal my source,
but it's not from the mall.

(STUTTERS)
You keep that
away from me.

I've always wanted
to do that.

I think
the best thing
for us to do

is just sit
Frankie down
and discuss it.

Let her know
we're here for her.

Mm. I'm so glad
you agree with me.

I really need
to talk to you.

Oh, I wasn't talking
to you guys.

GR, where are you?
I wanna give you an update.

Well, you're talking
to a spatula.

I'm trying out
for a school play.

I'm using the spatula
as a scene partner.

Christine, put GR on.
It's urgent.

I'm sorry, Frankie.
Grim's not here.

Between the council
and the mishaps,

Grim wanted a getaway
to rest and recharge.

Okay.
And where did she go?

Whoops, gotta run.
The underworld is quite busy.

Look who has
their own talisman
to protect themselves

against that
no-good, rotten,
old man Snickering.

It's okay.
I'm just happy to help.

Now, it's my turn to give you
a bracelet to protect you.

And it's my turn
to say "aww".

Okay, look.
Something weird's
going on.

Christine said Grim left
and went on vacation.

Aw, I'm happy
she finally took
some me time.

Not when that heartless
weasel Snickering
is still on the loose.

I don't know
where Grim really is,

As long as
we each have
the talisman.

Then let's find
that missing page

and return that horrible,
backstabbing monster

to the underworld
where he belongs.

I get it. You don't
have to keep saying
you're sorry.

What? He said
we didn't have
to say we're sorry.

Okay, so where would
Theodore hide something

There's a safe
on each floor.

Genius.
No one would
ever guess that.

Pretty and I
will hit that up first.

And he's always been
super strange about
his argyle sock drawer.

Feet stuff?
He also said panic room.

We've got exactly one hour
before Great-Granddad's done
with his daily steam.

Ooh, I could use
some steam.

I didn't wanna
bring this up earlier,

Grim's taking you both
back to the underworld.

I know you're here
as my guardians,

I hope Mr. Snickering
has a handkerchief drawer.

Let's not worry about that
until we're done.

And for the record, I only
care about finishing this

because I want you
to be safe.

I see you
as family now too.

Ugh, feelings.
Time to destroy Theodore.

Never mind,
it's just Theodore's doodles.

Wow, he really likes
to draw hearts.

Surprising for such
a wretched, soulless,
vile human being.

Once you start,
it's hard to stop.

I didn't know
we were having company.

Granddad?
I-I thought you were steaming.

Which I hear
is very healthy
and great for the pores.

Oh, Frankie,
that's not why I do it.

I steam
to sweat weakness
out of my body.

That's the alarm
on my sock drawer.

You didn't tell me
about all the stairs
in this house.

Or the alarm
on the sock drawer.

You found
the Book Of Souls page?

Even better. I peed
in a gold-plated toilet.

Don't worry,
I was super stealth.
I didn't flush.

What? If it's yellow,
let it mellow.

This whole house
is full of weird.

What are you
meddling kids doing?

Not using
your gold-plated toilet,
that's for sure.

I'm just gonna
look around a little bit

like a supportive,
not snooping parent.

it won't hurt
to look in one drawer.

It's not like we're
gonna read her diary.

Unless you think
we need to.

What did you do
to Grim?

I don't know
what you're talking about.

and that showed up
by mistake.

We know about everything
you've been doing
in this town.

And we know
I fell down a manhole
that was meant for you.

I mean, we did
become best friends
because of it,

Erlic, why aren't you
on my side?

'Cause I can't trust
anything you say.

You won't remember
any of this, anyway.

Glowy eyes
won't work on us.

Yeah, we all
have very cute
matching talismans.

How do you
like us now?

I should have known
you'd give them toys.

None of your puny powers
will work on her.

And there's nothing
you can do about it.
Spit went down the wrong pipe.

I knew I was
right about you.

Uh, maybe now's not the time
to confront the evil man

holding that weird
ball of power.

There's one thing
you need to know
about me.

I always get
the last laugh.

maybe we're stronger
as a team.

It always works
in those superhero movies.

You'll never get
your precious Grim back.

But if it helps you
feel better,

she will make
an excellent addition

to my statue collection
in the west wing.

We won't let you
take Grim.

Focus all your thoughts
and energies on Grim.

Looks like someone else
might be getting
the last laugh.

It says here
that if Frankie
doesn't complete

a series of tasks
for the Grim Reaper...

she'll go back
to the underworld forever.

(SIGHS) No wonder she's
talking to kitchen utensils.

Didn't she say
they were going
to Erlic's?

Now stop
whatever you're doing
this instant!

Sometimes
when you poke the bear,
the bear pokes back!

She's free.
The Grim Reaper is free.

I owe you all
an enormous thank you.

I need you all
to clear the room.

Mom? Dad?
What are you doing here?

Frankie, we found
the Underworld contract.

Why didn't you tell us
about all of this?

Jonathan,
this might be better
in private.

And where is that
Grim Reaper,
anyway?

'Cause I need
to give her
a piece of my mind.

Mom, the contract
doesn't matter anymore.

so I don't have
to go back
to the underworld.

Hold up. You went
through my room?

How about we make
it up to you with some
"we're sorry" ice cream?

Yeah, but I think
I need to say
one final goodbye.

I know
this won't be easy,

but I'm here
if you need me.

Now I gotta say goodbye
to that miserable,

wretched, despicable
snake of a grandfather.

You're right.
Once you start,
you can't stop.

Well, I've lost
the battle, Grim.

I'm ready to return
to the Underworld now.

Good,
because you don't
have a choice.

You can't say it wasn't
a fun ride though.

Not at all a fun ride,
Theodore.

But at least now
I can finally correct
my first mishap.

I need to ask you
something important.

I'm going to be,
well, relocating.

Would you mind
taking care of Erlic
until his parents return?

It would be the honor
of a lifetime, sir.

Grim, may I have a moment
with my great-grandson?

A wee moment.
And I'm watching you.

but she caught up
with me.

I'm sorry
I let you down.

everything works out
the way it's supposed to.

Now, where's my
Book Of Souls page?

(CLEARS THROAT)
I always keep it
close to me.

Very good.
Places to go,
people to down-arrow.

You don't have me or my page
from the Book Of Souls.

this evil laugh
is gonna kill me.
(SIGHS)

You're supposed
to be Theodore.
Why aren't you Theodore?

Ooh, that's mishap
number three,
isn't it?

(CHUCKLES)
I will fix this.
It's what I do.

I guess we should
pack up our stuff.

(SIGHS) You know what?
You're not packing,

because I'm gonna
ask Grim for more tasks
so you can stay.

GR. Hello?
I need to talk to you.

I'm afraid you won't be
talking to Grim for a while.

Erlic? What are you doing
in the underworld?

Erlic Snickering,
do not interrupt me again.

No, I don't care
what you're saying.
How do I get Erlic back?

That's between Grim
and the Underworld council.

For now, you will communicate
with me. That is all.

Now, what would Grim say
if she were here?

What happened?
What did
the Grim Reaper say?

Wait, if Erlic
is there,
that means...

We have to help
Grim and Erlic.

We need to fix
this mishap ourselves.

Remy, I can't believe
I'm saying this...

but we're gonna need
all the S.W.E.A.T.I. help
we can get.
